title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Concept Map-Integrated Mobile Learning for Enhancing Outdoor Scientific Observation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can classify observation targets in outdoor ecological environments and structure them into concept maps.
Learners can systematically collect and analyze observation data using mobile devices.
Learners can improve the logical connectivity of concept maps through peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
